content.query:
-- Parquet
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://kubastorage.dfs.core.windows.net/test-container/gold/FL_insurance_sample/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]


-- Managed Table
SELECT TOP (100) [county]
,[count_policyID]
,[max_eq_site_limit]
,[policyID_with_max_eq_site_limit]
 FROM [insurance].[dbo].[fl_insurance_sample]
